title: Phase 15: Testing - Pass All 408 SQLite Tests
description: SUPERSEDED: Replaced by Phase 15: Final Integration Testing task. This task is no longer needed.

title: Phase 9: Joins - Inner Join
description: Implement INNER JOIN. Support equi-joins and theta-joins. Implement efficient join algorithms (nested loop, hash join, or sort-merge join). **Testing**: Pass queries with INNER JOIN from select2-5.test and random/select/* test suites.

title: Phase 9: Joins - Multiple Table Joins
description: Support joining multiple tables in a single query. Handle join order optimization and complex join conditions. **Testing**: Pass complex multi-table join queries from select3-5.test.

title: Phase 13: Transaction Management - Locking and Concurrency
description: Implement locking mechanism for concurrent access. Support read locks, write locks, and deadlock detection. Handle isolation levels (READ UNCOMMITTED, READ COMMITTED, etc.). **Testing**: Create concurrent access test scenarios to verify locking and isolation behavior. Also pass tests/custom/phase13_transactions.test for transaction isolation validation.

title: Phase 13: Transaction Management - Transaction Support
description: Implement transaction support with BEGIN, COMMIT, ROLLBACK. Maintain transaction state, support nested transactions if needed, and handle transaction isolation. **Testing**: Create test cases that verify transaction boundaries and rollback behavior. Also pass tests/custom/phase13_transactions.test for comprehensive transaction validation.

title: Phase 7: Query Execution - Table Scan
description: Implement basic table scan iterator. Read rows from storage engine, apply simple filters, and return results. Foundation for all query execution. **Testing**: Pass basic SELECT queries from select1.test that don't require complex features.

title: Phase 15: Testing - Pass Random Test Suites
description: SUPERSEDED: Testing is now integrated into each phase. This task is no longer needed.

title: Phase 9: Joins - LEFT/RIGHT/OUTER Joins
description: Implement LEFT JOIN, RIGHT JOIN, and FULL OUTER JOIN. Handle NULL padding for non-matching rows correctly. **Testing**: Pass queries with OUTER JOINs from select2-5.test and random/select/* test suites.

title: Phase 12: Query Planning - Cost-Based Optimization
description: Implement cost estimation for different execution plans. Estimate I/O costs, CPU costs, and select optimal plans. Support statistics collection for better estimates. **Testing**: Verify cost-based optimization improves query performance on complex queries from select3-5.test.

title: Phase 12: Query Planning - Basic Query Planner
description: Implement query planner that selects execution strategies. Choose between table scan vs index scan, join order, and execution plan optimization. **Testing**: Verify optimal plan selection by comparing performance on select1-5.test queries. Also pass tests/custom/phase12_query_planning.test for comprehensive query planning validation.

title: Phase 10: Subqueries - Derived Tables and CTEs
description: Implement subqueries in FROM clause (derived tables) and Common Table Expressions (WITH clauses). Support recursive CTEs if needed by test suite. **Testing**: Pass queries with derived tables and CTEs from select2-5.test.

title: Phase 17: Documentation - Architecture Documentation
description: Document the database architecture, design decisions, and implementation details. Create diagrams showing component interactions and data flow.

title: Phase 7: Query Execution - WHERE Clause Filtering
description: Implement WHERE clause evaluation. Filter rows based on boolean expressions, handle complex conditions with AND/OR, and optimize predicate evaluation order. **Testing**: Pass queries with WHERE clauses from select1.test and random/select/* test suites.

title: Phase 15: Testing - Pass Evidence Tests
description: SUPERSEDED: Testing is now integrated into each phase. This task is no longer needed.

title: Phase 10: Subqueries - EXISTS and IN Subqueries
description: Implement EXISTS and IN subqueries. Optimize subquery execution, handle correlated subqueries efficiently, and support NOT EXISTS and NOT IN. **Testing**: Pass queries with EXISTS/IN subqueries from select1-5.test and evidence/in1.test, evidence/in2.test.

title: Phase 6: DML Implementation - UPDATE
description: Implement UPDATE statement with WHERE clauses. Support updating multiple columns, expression-based updates, and conditional updates. Handle NULL assignments correctly. **Testing**: Pass evidence/slt_lang_update.test and index/delete/* test suites (which include UPDATE operations).

title: Phase 16: Performance - Storage Engine Optimization
description: Optimize storage engine for better I/O performance. Implement page caching, write batching, and efficient page allocation strategies.

title: Phase 6: DML Implementation - INSERT
description: Implement INSERT statement. Support column order variations, value lists, and expressions. Handle type coercion and constraint validation. Return affected row count. **Testing**: Pass all INSERT statements from select1-5.test with various column orderings.

title: Phase 5: Expression Evaluation - CASE Expressions
description: Implement CASE expressions (both simple CASE WHEN and searched CASE WHEN). Handle ELSE clauses and proper NULL handling. **Testing**: Pass queries with CASE expressions from select1-5.test and random/expr/* test suites.

title: Phase 11: Indexing - B-Tree Index Structure
description: Design and implement B-tree index structure from first principles. Support key-value storage, range queries, and efficient insertion/deletion. Store index pages in storage engine. **Testing**: Verify index structure correctness with index/random/* test suites. Also pass tests/custom/phase11_indexing.test for comprehensive indexing validation.

title: Phase 13: Transaction Management - ACID Properties
description: Implement ACID properties: Atomicity (all-or-nothing), Consistency (constraints), Isolation (concurrency control), Durability (persistence). Support write-ahead logging (WAL) or similar mechanism. **Testing**: Verify ACID properties with concurrent test scenarios and crash recovery tests. Also pass tests/custom/phase13_transactions.test for comprehensive ACID validation.

title: Phase 11: Indexing - Index Scan and Lookup
description: Implement index scan operations. Use indexes for equality lookups, range scans, and ORDER BY optimization. Integrate index usage into query planner. **Testing**: Pass index/commute/* test suites which test index usage for query optimization.

title: Phase 17: Documentation - API Documentation
description: Add comprehensive Rust doc comments to all public APIs. Generate and review documentation. Document usage examples and best practices.

title: Phase 1: Core Infrastructure - AST Representation
description: Design and implement Abstract Syntax Tree (AST) structures to represent all parsed SQL statements. Include nodes for DDL (CREATE/DROP), DML (INSERT/UPDATE/DELETE), DQL (SELECT), expressions, conditions, and subqueries. **Testing**: Verify AST correctly represents all statement types from select1.test.

title: Phase 15: Testing - Pass select2-5.test
description: SUPERSEDED: Testing is now integrated into each phase. This task is no longer needed.

title: Phase 15: Testing - Pass select1.test
description: SUPERSEDED: Testing is now integrated into each phase. This task is no longer needed.

title: Phase 2: Storage Engine - Page-Based Storage
description: Implement a page-based storage engine from first principles. Design page structure, page allocation, and on-disk layout. Support both in-memory and persistent storage modes. **Testing**: Verify data persistence by creating tables, inserting data, and reading it back in select1.test. Also pass tests/custom/phase2_storage_engine.test for comprehensive storage engine validation.

title: Phase 1: Core Infrastructure - SQL Parser
description: Build a SQL parser from scratch that can parse all SQL statements needed for SQLite tests: CREATE TABLE, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE, SELECT, DROP, CREATE INDEX, etc. Must handle complex expressions, subqueries, JOINs, and all SQL syntax used in the test suite. **Testing**: Pass basic parsing tests from select1.test (CREATE TABLE, INSERT, simple SELECT statements).

comments.author: reallocf
comments.text: Implemented a new SQL parser module with lexer + recursive-descent parsing for CREATE TABLE/INDEX/VIEW, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE, SELECT, expressions (CASE, subqueries, EXISTS, IN, BETWEEN, LIKE, IS NULL), joins, ORDER BY, LIMIT/OFFSET. Added unit tests covering select1-style CREATE/INSERT/SELECT (CASE + subquery, EXISTS). Tests pass via cargo test --lib. Remaining: expand parser to cover full SQLite test-suite syntax (e.g., WITH/CTE, UNION/INTERSECT, compound SELECT, PRAGMA, ALTER, transaction statements, more data types/constraints, COLLATE, NULLS FIRST/LAST, window functions, etc.), add broader parsing tests derived from actual .test/.slt files, and integrate parser usage in runtime as needed.

title: Phase 2: Storage Engine - Table Schema Management
description: Implement table schema storage and management. Store table metadata (column names, types, constraints) in the storage engine. Support schema versioning and schema queries. **Testing**: Pass CREATE TABLE statements and verify schema is correctly stored and retrieved.

title: Phase 6: DML Implementation - DELETE
description: Implement DELETE statement with WHERE clauses. Support conditional deletion and handle cascading deletes if foreign keys are implemented. **Testing**: Pass index/delete/* test suites.

title: Phase 8: Aggregation - Aggregate Functions
description: Implement aggregate functions: COUNT, SUM, AVG, MAX, MIN. Support COUNT(*), COUNT(column), and handle NULL values correctly in aggregates. Support HAVING clause filtering on aggregates. **Testing**: Pass evidence/slt_lang_aggfunc.test and random/aggregates/* test suites (130 files).

title: Phase 7: Query Execution - Column Selection and Projection
description: Implement SELECT column projection. Support column names, expressions, aliases, and * wildcard. Evaluate expressions for each row and build result sets. **Testing**: Pass queries with various column selections from select1-5.test.

title: Phase 5: Expression Evaluation - Arithmetic and Logical Operators
description: Implement expression evaluator for arithmetic (+, -, *, /, %), comparison (=, !=, <, >, <=, >=), and logical (AND, OR, NOT) operators. Handle NULL propagation correctly according to SQL semantics. **Testing**: Pass queries with arithmetic and logical expressions from select1.test and random/expr/* test suites.

title: Phase 5: Expression Evaluation - BETWEEN and EXISTS
description: Implement BETWEEN operator and EXISTS subquery predicate. Handle NULL values and edge cases correctly. **Testing**: Pass queries with BETWEEN from select1.test and index/between/* test suites. Pass EXISTS queries from select1-5.test.

title: Phase 4: DDL Implementation - CREATE/DROP INDEX
description: Implement index creation and deletion. Design index structure (B-tree or similar), store index metadata, and maintain index entries. Support single and multi-column indexes. **Testing**: Pass evidence/slt_lang_dropindex.test and index/* test suites.

title: Phase 6: DML Implementation - REPLACE
description: Implement REPLACE statement (INSERT OR REPLACE semantics). Handle conflicts with PRIMARY KEY or UNIQUE constraints. **Testing**: Pass evidence/slt_lang_replace.test.

title: Phase 3: Type System - Data Type Support
description: Implement SQLite-compatible type system: INTEGER, REAL, TEXT, BLOB, NULL. Handle type coercion, type affinity, and implicit conversions according to SQLite rules. **Testing**: Pass queries with mixed data types from select1.test and verify correct type handling. Also pass tests/custom/phase3_type_system.test for comprehensive type system validation.

title: Phase 7: Query Execution - ORDER BY
description: Implement ORDER BY clause. Support multiple sort columns, ASC/DESC, and NULL handling (NULLS FIRST/LAST). Implement efficient sorting algorithms for large result sets. **Testing**: Pass queries with ORDER BY from select1-5.test and index/orderby/*, index/orderby_nosort/* test suites.

title: Phase 7: Query Execution - DISTINCT
description: Implement DISTINCT keyword. Remove duplicate rows from result sets efficiently, handling NULL values correctly (NULL = NULL for DISTINCT purposes). **Testing**: Pass queries with DISTINCT from select1-5.test and random/select/* test suites.

title: Phase 14: Integration - Error Handling
description: Implement comprehensive error handling. Define error types for all failure modes (parse errors, execution errors, constraint violations, etc.). Provide clear error messages matching SQLite behavior. **Testing**: Verify error messages match SQLite for invalid SQL statements and constraint violations.

title: Phase 16: Performance - Query Optimization
description: Optimize query performance to match or exceed SQLite performance on test queries. Profile and optimize hot paths, reduce allocations, and improve algorithm efficiency.

title: Phase 14: Integration - Replace rusqlite with gongdb
description: Replace the SQLiteDB wrapper in lib.rs with GongDB implementation. Implement the AsyncDB trait for sqllogictest integration. Ensure all test infrastructure works with the new database. **Testing**: Verify integration works by running a subset of select1.test queries end-to-end.

title: Phase 4: DDL Implementation - DROP TABLE
description: Implement DROP TABLE statement. Remove table schema, deallocate all pages, and clean up metadata. Handle foreign key constraints and dependent objects. **Testing**: Pass evidence/slt_lang_droptable.test.

title: Phase 11: Indexing - Index Maintenance
description: Implement automatic index maintenance. Update indexes on INSERT/UPDATE/DELETE operations. Handle index corruption and recovery. **Testing**: Pass evidence/slt_lang_reindex.test and verify indexes stay consistent through all DML operations.

title: Phase 8: Aggregation - GROUP BY
description: Implement GROUP BY clause. Group rows by specified columns, handle NULL grouping keys, and support grouping by expressions. **Testing**: Pass queries with GROUP BY from select1-5.test and random/groupby/* test suites (14 files).

title: Phase 5: Expression Evaluation - IN and NOT IN
description: Implement IN and NOT IN operators with both value lists and subqueries. Handle NULL semantics correctly (empty sets, NULL in lists, etc.) according to SQLite behavior. **Testing**: Pass evidence/in1.test, evidence/in2.test, and index/in/* test suites.

title: Phase 4: DDL Implementation - CREATE TABLE
description: Implement CREATE TABLE statement execution. Parse table definition, validate constraints, create schema metadata, and allocate initial storage. Support column types, PRIMARY KEY, and table constraints. **Testing**: Pass all CREATE TABLE statements from select1-5.test and evidence/slt_lang_droptable.test.

title: Phase 3: Type System - Value Representation
description: Design and implement Value enum/struct to represent all SQL data types in memory. Support efficient comparisons, arithmetic operations, and conversions between types. **Testing**: Verify correct value representation and operations in select1.test queries.

title: Phase 15: Final Integration Testing - Pass All 408 SQLite Tests
description: Final milestone: pass all 408 SQLite test files. Run full test suite (select1-5.test, evidence/*, index/*, random/*) and fix any remaining bugs. Ensure 100% compatibility with SQLite test expectations. This phase validates that all previous phases work together correctly.

title: Phase 2: Storage Engine - Row Storage and Serialization
description: Implement row storage format with serialization/deserialization. Support variable-length data types (VARCHAR, TEXT), fixed-length types (INTEGER), and NULL handling. Design efficient row layout within pages. **Testing**: Pass INSERT statements with various column orders from select1.test and verify data integrity.

title: Phase 4: DDL Implementation - CREATE/DROP VIEW
description: Implement view support. Store view definitions, parse and validate view queries, and support querying views as if they were tables. **Testing**: Pass evidence/slt_lang_createview.test, evidence/slt_lang_dropview.test, and index/view/* test suites.

title: Phase 5: Expression Evaluation - Built-in Functions
description: Implement SQLite built-in functions: abs(), avg(), count(), sum(), max(), min(), and other functions used in test suite. Support both aggregate and scalar functions. **Testing**: Pass evidence/slt_lang_aggfunc.test and random/aggregates/* test suites (130 files).

title: Phase 10: Subqueries - Scalar Subqueries
description: Implement scalar subqueries (subqueries that return a single value). Support subqueries in SELECT lists, WHERE clauses, and expressions. Handle correlated subqueries. **Testing**: Pass queries with scalar subqueries from select1-5.test (many examples in select1.test).
